TEXT.TITLE: MITSUI REAL ESTATE DEVELOPMENT CO LTD <MREA.T>
TEXT.BODY: Year ended March 31 Group shr 33.98 yen vs 39.10 Net 21.16 billion vs 19.96 billion Current 45.23 billion vs 32.87 billion Operating 77.17 billion vs 63.90 billion Sales 616.96 billion vs 527.88 billion NOTE - The company said the 37.6 pct increase in 1986/87 group current profit from a year earlier was mainly due to a drop of two billion yen in interest payments. REUTER
